content: **from the website ** beautiful beginner friendly pattern that appeals to all skill levels for crochet this project is a great learning project and also makes a fun but relaxing project for your own home or the perfect gift for someone special * red heart® carefree cotton blend™ 18 ounces 3533 periwinkle ca and 16 ounces 3643 kiwi cb alternate yarn red heart soft touch 4 balls main color 3 balls constrast color yardage above is from this yarn *gauge * one repeat of 18 sts = 4 1/2 8 row = 3 3/4 in pat
